--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Derek James" <blue5432@y...> wrote:

> 
> My instinct would be to not combine the nodes that identify the 
cards 
> with the ones that indicate its up/down state, but I'm admittedly 
not 
> very experienced.  I'd probably have a dedicated node that 
indicates 
> card state, and have separate input nodes for the identity.
> 
> Anybody else have any thoughts on this?
> 

I have the same feeling, since if you combine nodes then
somewhere in the net it has to separate out the information
again, which might be complicated.

ken
